snippet: Pablo Carreno Busta, a 21-year-old from Spain, has improved his ranking more than 500 places since January and is now 143rd after returning from back surgery.
abstract: Pablo Carreno Busta, a 21-year-old from Spain, has improved his ranking more than 500 places since January and is now 143rd after returning from back surgery.

headline.main: Rising Spaniard Keeps Busy at Lower-Level Events
